title: Letter to the Honorable Pamela E. Robinson
abstract:
December 18, 2008
Pamela E. Robinson, Clerk of the Court
United States District Court for the Central District of Illinois
218 U.S. Courthouse
201 S. Vine Street                 
Urbana IL 61802           
 
 
 
THIRD AND FINAL NOTICE
Dear Ms. Hackett:
I am writing in the matter of the privacy audit of selected courts, including the United 
States District Court for the Central District of Illinois.  The preliminary audit was sent 
to the Honorable Mr. Duff at the Administrative Office of the Co
